items.content_html: RNPasswordKeeper is a lightweight and secure React Native application designed to store your passwords locally on your device. With a focus on privacy and simplicity, this app does not require any API integrations or internet connectivity, ensuring that your sensitive information remains completely offline and safe.
items.title: ArturHoncharuk/RNPasswordKeeper: RNPasswordKeeper is a lightweight and secure React Native application designed to store your passwords locally on your device. With a focus on privacy and simplicity, this app does not require any API integrations or internet connectivity, ensuring that your sensitive information remains completely offline and safe.

items.content_html: A Telegram Mini App with a growing collection of tools like calculators, converters, and more. All tools are created using advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), ensuring smart and efficient functionality. Lightweight, user-friendly, and regularly updated to simplify everyday tasks directly within Telegram.
